Grand Master Brom:
Goddess of death opened her eyes, Monsters Elder build evil plans to conquer Aden. Valiant Vanguard Aden found near the Forbidden Gate in the dungeon lair of evil creatures and tried to destroy it. Braves were missing, and we were going to send a scouting party them to help. If you will do us assistance in this difficult campaign, then I will help you to discover a new strength.
(After reaching level 76 is available the third profession.)
